title: GRACE KARIN Women's Sequin Sparkly Party Dress Cocktail Bodycon Glitter Dresses Long Sleeve
description: Dress for Party: If you're looking for a dress to cocktail party, you will never regret to get this SEQUIN bodycon pencil dress.

Excellent Design: When you don’t want to show your arms, long sleeve makes you feel more comfortable. Classic V neckline design fits all kinds of body shape, make you more elegant and sexy. The buttock wrap is the perfect way to show off the curves of your body.
Zipper Closure: The invisible zipper design on back, not only beautiful, but also very convenient to put on or take off, in particular, putting on this dress after makeup won't ruin your look.
Washing: Washing Tips: Hand Wash/Dry Cleaning, it is recommended to keep it in a laundry bag to better protect the dress
Service: If doesn’t fit well, you can get a return in 30 days, so don't hesitate if you like it. Hope you can catch everyone’s attention in this dress.
